name: Cameron O'Toole
summary: Aspiring software engineer with a solid foundation in front-end and back-end technologies, transitioning from a successful background in retail sales and management. Adept at leading teams and improving performance, now utilizing analytical skills and a passion for technology to create efficient, innovative software solutions. Proficient in JavaScript, Python, React, Redux, Node.js, NoSQL, and SQL, with firsthand experience in building web applications and managing databases.

projects.name: Bifrost Bookings | NC State | July 2024
description: Developed a full-stack flight reservation application inspired by Norse mythology, utilizing React, Redux, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL, with Weatherbit API integration for weather data.
Features include secure user authentication, customizable user profiles, dynamic flight search, and comprehensive booking management with full CRUD functionality.
Currently developing an admin dashboard, enhancing search functionality with real flight data, and improving UI/UX for a better user experience.
Planning to add multi-language support, developing a mobile app, and implementing notification features for flight and booking alerts.

projects.name: Tetris Clone | NC State | June 2024
description: Developed a Tetris clone using JavaScript, React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.

Designed and implemented game mechanics, including piece movement, rotation, and collision detection, with on-screen controls or keyboard inputs, providing real-time updates to the player's total score.
Addressed a known issue where indefinite left or right movement of a block triggered a false game over by limiting blocks to stay within the canvas.
Ensured a responsive design and compatibility across different devices, enhancing the game's accessibility and user experience.

projects.name: Blackjack Browser Game | NC State | March 2024
description: Developed a dynamic blackjack card game with complex game logic and interactive features using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Implemented the game logic and user interface, ensuring a smooth and engaging user experience.
Encountered and resolved a challenge in implementing the ace card value switching depending on the player's total by leveraging JavaScript knowledge and reading documentation.
Added a betting feature to enhance player engagement.

Deployed the game using GitHubs deployment feature, gathered and incorporated user feedback to enhance functionality and performance, resulting in improved user satisfaction and engagement. Ongoing updates.

experience.title: Air Handler
description: Efficiently sorted and grouped packages from incoming flights based on the destination, ensuring accurate and timely loading into appropriate trucks, resulting in increased sorting efficiency and faster delivery times.
Adhered strictly to safety and security protocols while managing high volumes of packages, contributing to a reduction in workplace incidents and ensuring the safety of team members and packages.
Managed delicate and valuable packages with the utmost care, maintaining high standards of package integrity and significantly reducing the rate of damaged packages.

experience.title: Senior Guest Advisor
description: Analyzed the existing store layout and identified opportunities to optimize product visibility and maximize sales potential.
Implemented strategic visual merchandising tactics to improve store aesthetics and customer flow.
Evaluated product relationships to inform redesign decisions, enhancing customer engagement through effective displays.
Successfully redesigned the store layout, aligning product displays with customer behavior.
Increased average transaction value by 10% and overall store sales by 12% within the first quarter post-implementation.

experience.title: Co-Manager
description: Identified inconsistencies in store performance across key metrics.
Led efforts to improve store performance through data-driven decision-making processes.
Developed and implemented the 'perfect sale' strategy, promoting product bundling of shoes, socks, and accessories, and encouraging friendly competition among team members.
Enhanced overall store performance by 18%, with a 12% increase in customer retention over six months.
